hymn.title: Have you found your human spirit
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—The Human Spirit

layout.singingstanza: Have you found your hu -- man spir -- it? It's con -- nect -- ed to your mouth! "Hal -- le -- lu -- jah, O Lord Je -- sus!" That's the way to let it out. What is born of God is our hu -- man spir -- it— Praise God, the job has been done! What is born of Spir -- it is just our spir -- it, And the two spir -- its are one.

lyrics.stanza: Have you found your human spirit? It's connected to your mouth! "Hallelujah, O Lord Jesus!" That's the way to let it out.
What is born of God is our human spirit— Praise God, the job has been done! What is born of Spirit is just our spirit, And the two spirits are one.
Don't wait for an inspiration— That's the subtle enemy. Open up! Release your spirit, Testifying you are free.
